I’m Daniel Fosco, a designer based in Rio de Janeiro.

Hi!

I design to solve problems for people.

Designing products and services that offer them real value is good business. I work with clients and startups to build solutions through UX Design & Front-End Development.

I’m available for new projects starting December 2014. Get in touch here.

Recent projects

Swerve Fitness
Instagram Print

Writing

I write on tech, design & development. You can follow along here.

About

My background is in Book Publishing, but Design eventually took over.

After working in a digital publishing platform for a few years, I decided to fully shift to Product Design — to be involved with and own the design process from start to end.

For this, General Assembly’s 10-week UX Design program I took in 2014 was instrumental to complement my UX skillset — as well as build relationships with other kickass designers.

Say hi

Drop me a line at danielfosco@gmail.com or @notdanielfosco.

You can also find me at Github and LinkedIn.
